channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 18:52 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 18:52 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 18:48 pumping anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky rayon-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivsk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 18:48 pumping anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky rayon-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivsk Territorial Community#of Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
